What to Know About the Chris Hani Baragwanath Nursing College Application Form Portal

The Chris Hani Baragwanath Nursing College CHBNC Application portal is designed to accept applications of candidates seeking admission into the University. In the portal, applicants can Purchase application forms, Track and monitor application status, pay fees, Print Acknowledgement slips, check the admission lists, etc.

Who is Eligible to Apply for Admission

To be eligible for admission to the CHBNC application portal, candidates must;

  • Have a Secondary School Leaving Certificate
  • Meet National Senior Certificate (NSC) requirement for admission into Higher Certificate
  • Grade 12 certificate applicant is of added advantage
  • Must write the NBTs for admission to CHBNC on/before 15 October 2024.
  • FPS of 480 or above.
  • NBT scores of Upper
  • Intermediate for AL & QL
  • Mathematics 60%
  • English HL 50%
  • English FAL 60%

Chris Hani Baragwanath Nursing College

Chris Hani Baragwanath Nursing College is a nursing college located in Soweto, South Africa. The college is affiliated with the University of Witwatersrand and offers a range of nursing programs, including general nursing, psychiatric nursing, and community health nursing.

Here are some key facts about Chris Hani Baragwanath Nursing College:

  • The college was established in 1982 and is named after Chris Hani, a prominent anti-apartheid activist in South Africa.
  • The college is one of the largest nursing colleges in South Africa and has the capacity to train over 1,500 nursing students annually.
  • The nursing programs at Chris Hani Baragwanath Nursing College are accredited by the South African Nursing Council (SANC).
  • The college has modern facilities, including a simulation lab, library, and computer lab, and provides practical training in a variety of healthcare settings.
  • The college has a team of experienced lecturers who provide academic and personal support to students.
  • Chris Hani Baragwanath Nursing College has a strong focus on community engagement and provides healthcare services to underprivileged communities.
  • The college also offers post-basic nursing courses for registered nurses who wish to specialize in a particular area of nursing.

Chris Hani Baragwanath Nursing College Application Requirements

The application requirements for nursing programs at Chris Hani Baragwanath Nursing College may vary depending on the specific program and level of study. However, here are some general requirements for nursing programs at the college:
  1. You must be at least 17 years of age.
  2. You must have a South African ID or passport.
  3. You must have a matric certificate or equivalent qualification with at least a D symbol or achievement level 4 in the following subjects:
    • Mathematics or Mathematical Literacy
    • Physical Science (only for general nursing)
    • Life Science
    • English (first or second language)
  4. Applicants with a post-matric qualification in nursing-related fields or those who have completed a bridging course may be eligible for advanced placement in the nursing programs.
  5. You must meet the minimum requirements for the National Senior Certificate (NSC) or equivalent qualification.

In addition to the above requirements, some nursing programs at Chris Hani Baragwanath Nursing College may also require the following:

  1. A medical certificate of fitness
  2. A criminal record check
  3. Completion of a basic life support course
  4. A personal interview
  5. A passing score on the National Benchmark Test (NBT)

How to Apply | CHBNC Application Form 2024

To apply to Chris Hani Baragwanath Nursing College, you can follow these steps:

  1. Visit the Gauteng Department of Health website at https://www.gautengonline.gov.za/
  2. Click on the “Health Services” tab and select “Nursing Colleges”.
  3. Select “Chris Hani Baragwanath Nursing College” from the list of nursing colleges.
  4. Click on the “Apply Online” button to access the online application portal.
  5. Create an account on the application portal by providing your personal information, such as your name, ID number, and email address.
  6. Log in to your account and complete the online application form.
  7. Upload your supporting documents, such as your matric certificate or equivalent qualification, ID or passport, and any other required documents.
  8. Pay the application fee, if required, through the online portal.
  9. Submit your completed application.

 

Chris Hani Baragwanath Nursing College Application Required Documents

To apply to CHBNC you need to submit the following documentation:

  • A completed application form
  • A copy of your results for the latest school year
  • A copy of your ID
  • If you have attended another higher education institution, we need a copy of your academic transcript
